thread.title: JFrog Named 15th Fastest-Growing Private Company in Silicon Valley
thread.title_full: JFrog Named 15th Fastest-Growing Private Company in Silicon Valley

author: admin
title: JFrog Named 15th Fastest-Growing Private Company in Silicon Valley
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/21/2015 @ 6:01 AM Companies mentioned in this article: JFrog 
SANTA CLARA, CA -- (Marketwired) -- 10/21/15 -- JFrog today announced that it has been named as the 15th fastest-growing company by the Silicon Valley Business Journal's Fast Private Awards , an annual, prestigious list that recognizes Silicon Valley's 50 fastest-growing private companies. 
JFrog bridges the gap between DevOps and Dev teams with a mission to provide an enterprise-ready infrastructure for software management and distribution in open-source, on-premise and SaaS solutions. It is the company behind JFrog Artifactory , which allows users to manage software packages (artifacts) throughout the development cycle, and JFrog Bintray , which enables distribution and sharing of binaries quickly, easily and reliably. 
Together, JFrog Artifactory and Bintray form the only end-to-end solution for a fully automated continuous delivery pipeline in software development. JFrog is the only company that offers DevOps teams a universal high availability solution for Docker Registry, Maven, Gradle, Nuget, Ruby, Yum, PyPi repository -- to name a few. Its customer portfolio includes more than 1,500 customers at leading companies such as Oracle, VMware, Gap, Twitter and Google. 
"We're thrilled to be recognized by the Silicon Valley Business Journal as one of the fastest growing private companies in Silicon Valley," said JFrog CEO Shlomi Ben Haim. "This ranking validates our dedication to providing first-class service through superior quality code and strong customer relationships built on mutual trust and integrity. It's truly an honor to be a recipient, and we look forward to JFrog's continued growth and innovation." 
This recognition comes on the heels of Inc. Magazine recently naming JFrog one of the fastest growing private companies in the United States, and one of the top 100 software companies on its Inc. 5000 list of America's fastest growing private companies, with 690 percent growth over three years. 
The Silicon Valley Business Journal's Fast Private Awards is an annual list of the fastest growing private companies in Silicon Valley ranked by revenue growth. For the full list of this year's Fast 50 winners, visit: http://www.bizjournals.com/sanjose/subscriber-only/2015/10/16/fastest-growing-private-companies.html 
Tweet This: .@SVbizjournal recognizes @JFrog as the 15th fastest growing company in Silicon Valley #Fast50
